title: I have noticed several \Illegally destroyed vegitation\" signs around the area.  Once that comes to mind is at the Church\'s Chicken bus stop area.  Do these signs imply that damage as already occured or do they serve as a means to report witnessed damage?"
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. I have noticed several ñillegally destroyed vegetationî signs around the area. What do they mean?
